from vpython import *

# Screen Settings
scene = canvas(width=700, height=400)

# Cyber Input Variable Mapping
Height_I = 5  # initial height

g = 9.81  # acceleration due to gravity
v0 = 10  # initial velocity

# Objects
ground = box(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), size=vector(20, 0.1, 5), color=color.green)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(-10, Height_I, 0), radius=0.5, color=color.red, make_trail=True)

# Motion Function

    t = 0
    y = Height_I
    vy = 0

    while ball.pos.y >= 0:
        rate(100)
        t += dt
        vy -= g * dt
        ball.pos.y = y + vy * dt

    vy *= -0.9  # Elastic collision, 90% restitution
    y = 0

    while True:
        rate(100)
        t += dt
        vy -= g * dt
        ball.pos.y = y + vy * dt

# Run Motion
